Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-239, see notes under ยง 22-1831.

DC CODE ยง 22-1832

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: It is unlawful for an individual or a business knowingly to use coercion to cause a person to provide labor or services.
It is unlawful for an individual or a business knowingly to place or keep any person in debt bondage.

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.
